attributes.action: Review the Premier League and VAR decisions in general.
attributes.additional_details: To protect the supporters and teams to ensure there is a level playing field for all teams. This should also filter down to other leagues and completions ensuring supporters and teams are confident and can trust quality of officials officiating of games.
attributes.background: Debate the topic of VAR in parliament and its clear lack of impartiality and clear bias.

departments.name: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
